results.title: Provokable left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in a patient without hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: He had been diagnosed as having @<m>DISEASE_Hernia_Hiatal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006551 @@@hiatus hernia@@@ 2 years previously and was taking proton-pump inhibitors as necessary.
